Administration.text:
Type: Endothelin receptor antagonists
Dosage Forms: tablet, tablet for oral suspension
Dosage Strengths: tablet: 62.5, 125 mg; tablet for oral suspension: 32mg
Routes of Administration: PO
Common Trade Names: Tracleer

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: X
Lactation risk: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing:
Hepatic dosing: avoid in moderate-severe disease

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Concomitant administration with cyclosporine A or glyburide
Pregnancy or potential pregnancy

Serious.text:
Anemia
Cirrhosis, liver failure
Oligozoospermia
Edema, fluid retention

Anemia
Cirrhosis, liver failure
Oligozoospermia
Edema, fluid retention

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 5h
Metabolism: Hepatic: via CYP3A4 and CYP2C9
Excretion: Biliary, renal

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Dual endothelin receptor antagonist, inhibits vasoconstriction â†’ vasodilation
